div.span: Adapted from Inventory of Greek Coin Hoards

div.pre: 1463 Asia Minor ?, 1934-1935 Burial: c. 70 B.C. (M) Contents: 13+ AR Lysimachus: 1 tetradr. Athens: 1 New Style tetradr. Mithradates VI: 7 tetradr. (latest 75/4 B.C.) Nicomedes III, IV: 4 tetradr. Disposition: dispersed Thompson, Athens, p. 523
